Articles.Content:
Hi there everyone! Just poppin' in to introduce myself and give a big hello from Texas! My name is "Juvat" and I recently retired from military service. Tooling around the internet one day and saw this wickedly funny little thing called a Kerbal. The kids witnessed the awesomeness of KSP on YouTube and we all had to have it! Looking forward to soaking up all the knowledge that everyone here has to offer.

Cya 'round!

Counter-hiya from Arizona! If you need help with anything Kerbal, post on the forums or drop a message towards one of the more experienced (i.e. not me) forumgoers. Chances are, you will get a reply in a day or less.
And a big Howdy from New Mexico too. Ditto on what zx said.
